actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend veteran benefits to persons serving in the Armed Forces Occupation of Germany between November 12, 1918, and April 1, 1920.

summary.text: Defines members of the United States military forces occupation of Germany between November 12, 1918, and April 1, 1920, as veterans of World War I and entitles them to the same benefits enjoyed by veterans who served in Russia between those dates.

titles.title: A bill to extend veteran benefits to persons serving in the Armed Forces Occupation of Germany between November 12, 1918, and April 1, 1920.
